attributes.action: I want you to re-think the proposal to change the parking arrangements around QE
attributes.additional_details: Because every single morning no one can park to get into work. There’s not enough staff parking. People pay for permits and waste their money because they can’t get a parking space. Creating people to be regularly late for work and it a nightmare for disabled staff. Staff will cancel shifts or even move hospitals which will affect patient care. It will just solve the issues of the local neighbours of the hospital . But will majorly affect patient care and more inconvenience for our NHS staff.
attributes.background: To stop the parking regulations around the QE hospital.Build an extra car park to actually accommodate ALL the staff.

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level.

You could ask your MP to take action on your concerns about this issue, including by asking them to present a public (paper) petition about this.

You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP

And you can find out how to ask your MP to present a public (paper) petition here: https://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/sign-a-petition/paper-petitions/

You may wish to sign the following petition:

Free hospital parking for all NHS staff in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704699
